name: Cancer Research Data Commons (CRDC)
description: CRDC Cloud Resources and Data Commons offer support to researchers at all stages of their careers through community forums, training events, tutorials, and virtual office hours. The CRDC includes several Data Commons that store, manage, and make data searchable and accessible for analysis. Researchers can work directly with each data commons or can build a data manifest for use within a CRDC cloud environment.
use_cases: Make data accessible in a secure environment
Upload own data for comparative analysis
Collaborate with colleagues in a secure data environment

documentation.name: Broad FireCloud Powered by Terra Tutorials
